ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 31 Aug 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> Addendum. If you drop a container with a nodrop item in it the entire
> container will disappear.

Addendum to the addendum. If you are given /consent to loot a
corpse and you try to loot a container with a no-drop item in
it, it used to be that the container would disappear. The
container still disappears, but if you stop looting and loot
again, it will be back. Seems they fixed that bug, though in
a clumsy way.

> I highly recommend people keep their weapons in regular inventory slots,
> which can be hotkeyed. Then keep your instruments in a bag which can be
> on another hotkeyed inventory slot. This makes swapping a lot easier.

Unfortunately, if you aren't running at 640x480, you cannot
open the instrument bag without switching to inventory mode,
which defeats the whole purpose of hotkeying inventory slots.

> Only problem might be the Battle Drum. Is it lore? I haven't played in a
> couple of weeks now so I don't remember.

I don't think so. I don't think it's even labeled as a magic
item.
